feature_model.name: REAL-FM-18.xml

meta.data: Feature model for DocGen, a commercial documentation generator for software systems
Arie van Deursen and Paul Klint. Domain-specific language design requires feature descriptions. Journal of Computing and Information Technology, 10(1):1â€“17, 2002

feature_model.feature_tree: :r doc_gen (f0) :m analysis (f1) :m language_analysis (f2) :g [1,*] (f3) : cobol (cobol) :g [1,1] (f5) : ibm_cobol (f6) : microfocus_cobol (f7) : jcl (jcl) : sql (f8) : delphi (f9) : progress (f10) :o version_mngt (version_mngt) :o subsystems (subsystems) :m presentation (f11) :m localization (f12) :g [1,*] (f13) : english (f14) : dutch (f15) :m interaction (f16) :g [1,1] (f17) : static (staticfeature) : dynamic (f18) :m main_pages (f19) :g [1,*] (f20) : program_page (f21) :g [1,*] (f22) : annotation_section (annotation_section) : activation_section (f23) : entities_section (f24) : parameters_section (f25) : copybook_page (f26) : statistics_page (f27) :g [1,1] (f28) : with_history (f29) : without_history (f30) : indexes (f31) : search_page (search_page) : subsystem_page (subsystem_page) : source_page (f32) : source_difference (source_difference) :o visualizations (f33) :g [1,*] (f34) : perform_graph (perform_graph) : conditional_perform_graph (conditional_perform_graph) : jcl_graph (jcl_graph) : subsystem_graph (subsystem_graph) : overview_graph (f35) :m database (f36) :g [1,1] (f37) : db2 (f38) : oracle (f39) : mysql (f40)
feature_model.constraints: c1: ~subsystem_page or subsystems c2: ~subsystem_graph or subsystems c3: ~source_difference or version_mngt c4: ~perform_graph or cobol c5: ~conditional_perform_graph or cobol c6: ~jcl_graph or jcl c7: ~staticfeature or ~annotation_section c8: ~staticfeature or ~search_page
